mapper.select: select tranETime from (select to_char(TRAN_ETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') tranETime from t_car c,t_transact t where c.car_id=t.car_id and t.tran_state=2 and c.car_id=#{0} order by t.TRAN_ETIME desc) where rownum<=1

select t.TRAN_ID,t.PACK_ID,t.CAR_ID,t.PARK_ID, to_char(t.TRAN_STIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')TRAN_STIME,to_char(t.TRAN_ETIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')TRAN_ETIME ,t.TRAN_STATE, p.pack_name,p.pack_time,p.pack_cost,p.pack_state from t_transact t, t_pack p where p.pack_state=1 and t.pack_id= p.pack_id
and t.CAR_ID=#{carId}
